name: shorten-amazon-url
title: Shorten Amazon URL
description: Simply removes extraneous elements of an Amazon.com (US and others) product URL. Requires an Amazon product URL to be in the clipboard.
author: dustin_miller

commands.name: shorten-amazon-url
commands.title: Shorten Amazon Product URL
commands.subtitle: Clipboard
commands.description: Shortens Amazon product URLs to remove unneeded elements and tracking IDs

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
